author: Eun-Young Jeong
title: South Korea Detains Cryptocurrency Executives on Embezzlement Allegations
text:
SEOUL—South Korean prosecutors detained the heads of two cryptocurrency exchanges, including one of the country’s largest exchanges, for allegedly embezzling customers’ assets, the latest in a string of enforcement actions tied to suspected malfeasance in the country’s bitcoin market.

Prosecutors confirmed on Thursday that they had detained the chief of Coinnest, as well as the head of another unidentified bitcoin exchange and two other senior executives. Prosecutors will seek arrest warrants for the suspects pending further...
